aesi.io
Class StateWriter

java.lang.Object
  aesi.io.IO
      aesi.io.StateWriter

public class StateWriter
extends IO

The state writer can write a state (population and certain settings) to a file. The reason this is a different file is because I want to keep the IO file just for "every day use" file manipulation.

          Since we have abandoned the JGAP framework at this point I will use a simple text file with pre-defined rules for each line's value and reference
